name: BLOB (itch) (Minas W Games)
description:
A platform game where BLOB, a formless being, sees some shapes going through stuff and feels out of place when trying to do the samebecause it is harder for him. Help BLOB on his journey. #MigasGameJam

This game was developed during a women's game jam,  on Brazil Independence Day holiday.
